title: Ticket #55: Move all developer knowledge into GitTrac
description:
We need to coalesce as much information into the developer wiki as we can as fast as we can.

Stuff I, or MichaelBethencourt, have done already:

  • Moved these sections into the wiki
    • Really Important Stuff
    • Information for New Members
    • Wisdom

Stuff todo:

  • Finish moving old developer pages into Gittrac
  • Move drupal developer knowledge into Gittrac
